attributes.action: Abolish the 10 per cent rate of Income Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 10 per cent rate of Income Tax is a burden on low-paid employees.  The marginal rate of many claimants of tax credits is already in excess of 60 per cent, with some facing a rate as high as 70 per cent.  The abolition of the 10p rate would help low-paid employees, pensioners and provide everyone else with a tax cut of at least £200 a year.
